commitResults.messageTitle: Rename bot to Finch, Greet, Exit

commitResults.messageBody:
Echos commands entered by the user
Exits when the user types the command bye
Add additional ASCII art for bot name

Add the ability to store whatever text entered by the user
And the ability to display them back when user enters "list"
Add indentation for bot replies

Add task class to manage task
Users can mark tasks as done or change the status to not done

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak the code to comply with coding standards

commitResults.messageBody:
Add new class Todo, Deadline and Event that inherits from Task class to handle more commands
Changed if-else statements to switch cases for better readability

Created test input and expected output files for automated testing
Run runtest.sh to compare the difference and check if the test passes or fails

commitResults.messageTitle: add error handling for unknown commands
commitResults.messageBody: able to gracefully handle empty inputs, invalid commands and any other unexpected errors

commitResults.messageTitle: Add error handling for mark and unmark tasks
Add error handling for list method
Add error handling to addToDo and addTask method
Add error handling for addDeadline method
Add error handling for addEvent method
commitResults.messageBody:
Add extra error handling for mark and unmark, for if user inputs more than 1 task number
Remove try-catch statement for addDeadline method to be consistent with addEvent method

commitResults.messageTitle: Add FinchException class and updated mark and unmark methods
commitResults.messageBody:
FinchException class handles chatbot-specific error messages
This improves error handling by providing clearer, consistent messages instead of using generic Java exceptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Update addTask, add ToDo and list methods to throw FinchException for error handling
update addDeadline and addEvent methods to throw FinchException for error handling
Refactor addDeadline and addEvent methods into helper methods parseDeadline and parseEvent respectively
commitResults.messageBody: This makes for a cleaner and shorter addDeadline and addEvent method
Create 3 main packages, finch.ui, finch.task and finch.exception
Updated the EXPECTED.TXT to match the changes made from error handling

List of tasks are saved automatically in the finch.txt file, located in the data folder when the task list changes
Tasks are loaded from the hard-disk when the chatbot starts up

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/finch/ui/Finch.java

Add save to storage for delete command
Change data structure from fixed array to arrayList

New Ui class, TaskList class and Parser class
Update Storage class and other relevant command methods to utilise new classes
Finch class now under finch package and updated to refactored code

commitResults.messageTitle: Add even more usage of OOP
commitResults.messageBody: Refactored into individual command classes, that inherits from an abstract Command class

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the chatbot to understand dates
commitResults.messageBody: Deadline and Event command take in dates in the YYYY-MM-DD format

Removed unused import statements
Edit deadline and event class to use 1 constructor instead of 2
Allows user to find tasks by searching for keywords in the description of tasks
Add new command find

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDocs comments to the code

commitResults.messageBody: Add JavaDocs comments to the code

commitResults.messageTitle: Updated readme to show a user guide
